item.description:
This is an all Skill Level Ride !!!  You will have 3 Rides to choose from.  The Routes  are already marked from a Ride I just did.  I also have Maps.  You can Ride 34, 15, or 7 Miles.  Feel free to combine them, if you like.  I plan to do the 15 & then the 7.  I want to stay with the Newer Riders.

 

Ride # 1, 34 Miles: I just did it & really enjoyed it.  The Inclines / Hills, were not that long & were easy to climb.  You will Love the sections by the Ocean & Beaches.  There are places to stop, if you want to stop for Lunch or a Snack.  The Roads are marked & easy to follow.

 

Ride #2,  15 Miles, I have never Ridden this Route.  It is Marked  & should be easy to follow. The Terrain is similar  to the Narragansett Lighthouse Ride or my Goddard Park Ride. I am basing this on the 34 Mile Ride, Terrain.    This is good for those who want to get some Road experience & some Exercise.  I will be doing this Ride, so Newer Riders, should feel comfortable, giving it a try.  If you are not sure, take the Challenge & give it a try.

 

Ride #3,  7 Miles, This is good for Beginners & those who have Children, either Biking or in Tow.  Again the Route is Marked & I have a Map.  I plan to Ride this Route, after I Ride the 15 Mile Route.

 

IMPORTANT :  You must bring either 1 or 2 Spare Tubes  or the Phone # of a Local Cab. I can change a flat, but you MUST provide the Tube !!!!  FYI; I carry inflaters with me.  Those doing the 34 Mile Ride, you are on your own, but I am confident you will be OK.
item.name: Ride Around Southern R.I.
